downloadTitle: Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager - macOS Client (64-bit)
downloadDescription: Native 64-bit macOS client for use with Configuration Manager (current branch)
detailsSection:
The 64-bit macOS client allows you to manage Apple devices running the macOS using Configuration Manager (current branch)

Release History
  • 7/22/2021 - Update release, version 5.0.9000.1002, including bug fixes and added support for macOS 11
  • 3/20/2020 - Update release, version 5.0.8743.1000, bug fixes
  • 1/29/2020 - Original release, version 5.0.8742.1000 added support for macOS 10.15
systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Software:
    • Supported versions: Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager (current branch).

Supported configurations and hardware requirements: See the Client Requirements for Mac computers section in the Supported Configurations for Configuration Manager topic. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=839558
installInstructionSection:
1. Download the Mac client msi file to a Windows system
  2. Run the msi and it will create a dmg file under the default location “C:\Program Files\Microsoft\System Center Configuration Manager for Mac client\” on the Windows system
  3. Copy the dmg file to a network share or a folder on a Mac computer
  4. Access and open the dmg file on a Mac computer and install the client using instructions in the online documentation. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=839409
